thread.title: Hotel in quiet area, clean room with full function
thread.title_full: Hotel in quiet area, clean room with full function - Review of Mercure Paris Levallois Perret, Levallois-Perret, France - TripAdvisor

author: Miss_K_Ng
title: Hotel in quiet area, clean room with full function
text:
I arrived at hotel at early 7am, staff was friendly to open the door and check me in, so I can clean up myself before starting the day of meetings. Stayed here for 5 days, there's only 1 Evian water as compliments, but 2nd day onwards no refill, is this normal? Aside from that, room is clean and very quiet.
Breakfast was the same everyday, but there's plenty of food choices in that breakfast buffet corner, and has a nespresso coffee machine to fulfill my morning coffee needs.
It's about 5-15 minutes walk to 2 office buildings where I had my meetings at, and it's about 8 minutes walk to nearest metro station, so quite convenient. As it's in the residential area, so no taxi station nearby, you'll need to ask the hotel staff to help you call taxi.
